Flow.description: DR - 6/24/24 - Replacing with call count based Automated Outbound Comm records
Flow.label: DEPRECATE Contact Day #

textTemplates.name: ContactDay1
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c},

Thanks so much for contacting Saddle Rock Legal Group. We have been trying to contact you about the possible {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case. Please reach out to us as soon as possible. We can be reached at {!$Organization.Phone}.

Best Regards, {!Signature}

textTemplates.name: ContactDay2
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c},

Thanks so much for contacting Saddle Rock Legal Group

We have been trying to contact you about the possible {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case. When would be a good time to reach out to go through our intake process? Or you can reach out to us anytime at {!$Organization.Phone}.

Best Regards,
{!Signature}

textTemplates.name: FinalEmail
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c},

Thanks so much for contacting Saddle Rock Legal Group

This is Saddle Rock Legal Group. We have been trying to contact you about the possible {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case. At this point we will be closing the inquiry unless we hear from you. Please let us know if you would like to pursue any litigation. 

Best Regards,
{!Signature}

textTemplates.name: SendSMS
textTemplates.text: Hello {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c}, this is Saddle Rock Legal Group, calling for a possible {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case. Call 888-463-0699!

textTemplates.name: Signature
textTemplates.text:
intake@saddlerocklegal.com
(888) 686-6454
intake@saddlerocklegal.com
www.saddlerocklegal.com

This message is intended only for the use of the Addressee and may contain information that is PRIVILEGED and CONFIDENTIAL. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please erase all copies of the message and its attachments and notify us immediately. Your receipt of this email in no way creates an attorney-client relationship as such will be done by formal written agreement between you and Saddle Rock Legal Group LLC., or referring co-counsel, if applicable.

textTemplates.name: Subject
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c}, Important Notice from Saddle Rock Legal Group
